鬫鬫鬫

鬫字的基本解释

鬫
kàn
古同“闞”。

鬫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàn］
［《廣韻》苦濫切，去闞，溪。］
“監3”的被通假字。“阚1”的繁体字。
(1)望；远看。
(2)探望，看望。
(3)临。
(4)通“嵌”。
(5)古地名。在今山东省汶上县。
(6)姓。春秋齐有阚止。见《左传·哀公六年》。
[②]［hǎn］
［《廣韻》火斬切，上豏，曉。］
［《廣韻》許鑑切，去鑑，曉。］
“阚2”的繁体字。亦作“鬫1”。
(1)虎怒貌；虎叫声。
(2)阔大。
(3)大声。

鬫字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬥字部】　鬫； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1458第02
【廣韻】火斬切【集韻】【韻會】虎檻切【正韻】虎覽切，?音喊。虎聲。【詩·大雅】鬫如虓虎。又【前漢·敘傳】七雄虓鬫。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?許鑒切，喊去聲。獸怒聲。　【增韻】鬫本从鬥。俗今从門。【正字通】鬫望鬫姓之闞，當从門，卽孟子，王使人瞯夫子之瞯，訓竊視。虓鬫之鬫當从鬥，卽詩鬫如虓虎之鬫，訓奮怒。

鬫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬫字的起名意思

暂无。

鬫
Basic explanation of words
鬫
kàn
Ancient Tong "Kan".
鬫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kàn］
["Guangyun" cuts bitterly, go to Kan, Xi. ]
"Monitoring 3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "阚1".
(1) Look; see from afar.
(2) Visit, visit.
(3) Pro.
(4) Through "embedded".
(5) Ancient place names. In today's Wenshang County, Shandong Province.
(6) Last name. The spring and autumn seasons have Kanzhi. See "Zuo Zhuan·Ai Gong Six Years".
[②]［hǎn］
["Guangyun" Fire cuts and cuts, Shangfeng, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Jianqie, go to Jian, Xiao. ]
Traditional characters for "阚2". Also known as "鬫1".
(1) Tiger's angry appearance; tiger's cry.
(2) Broad.
(3) Loudly.
鬫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Fighting Word Department】　鬫; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1458 No. 02
[Guang Yun] Huo Zhan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tiger Threshold Cutting [Zheng Yun] Tiger reading and cutting, sound shout. Tiger sound. 【Poetry·Daya】Round like a tiger. Also 【Previous Han·Xu Biography】Seven Xiongsou.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] again? Xu Jianqie, shouted. The beast's fury.　【Zeng Yun】The original Congdou. Su Jin from the door. 【Zhengzitong】The Kan of the surname of Wang Wang, should be from the door, Mencius, the king makes people look at the master's eyes, and teaches stealing. The scorpion of the scorpion should be in the fight, and the poems of the scorpion are like the scorpion of the tiger, training and anger.
鬫
